definition: to notify at a different time/to notify later/to give prior notice
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: You and your friend are off the job until further notice.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的朋友被停職了，除非另行通知。

sentences.english: Students and families will be notified if there are any changes to the above calendar.
sentences.chinese: 以上行事曆如有任何更改，學校將另行通知。

sentences.english: Information in this list is subject to change without further notice.
sentences.chinese: 在此列表中的信息如有變更，恕不另行通知。

sentences.english: You will be notified if any changes are made to the below calendars.
sentences.chinese: 行事曆如有任何更改，學校將另行通知。

sentences.english: The date for admission test will be announced later.
sentences.chinese: 插班生試日期將另行通知。

sentences.english: Ivie reserves the right to modify or amend this privacy policy from time to time without prior notice.
sentences.chinese: 伊維有權修改或修正本隱私政策，恕不另行通知。

sentences.english: This contact information may change without notice.
sentences.chinese: 這些聯繫信息可隨時更改，不另行通知。

sentences.english: Due to an unexpected situation, our plan will be put into cold storage until further notice.
sentences.chinese: 由於意外情況，我們的計畫陷於停頓，改日另行通知。

sentences.english: The specification of all the applicances maybe modified without prior notice.
sentences.chinese: 以上產品規格如有修改，恕不另行通知。

sentences.english: This authorization is effective untill the signer below terminate it.
sentences.chinese: 此授權書有效期至以下簽名人另行通知之前。

sentences.english: We offer you subject to change without notice.
sentences.chinese: 我方向你方報盤，此報盤如有變化不另行通知。

sentences.english: Price are subject to change without prior notice.
sentences.chinese: 本公司保留調整價格的權利，不另行通知。

sentences.english: Offer Price, Now only RM150 , offer period untill further notice.
sentences.chinese: 優惠價，現在只需RM150，優惠期直到另行通知。

sentences.english: We will not provide notice of non-availability or substitution.
sentences.chinese: 若禮品換罄或已被取代，我們將無須作另行通知。

sentences.english: Please also note that shipping rates can change without notice.
sentences.chinese: 另請注意，運費可以變更，恕不另行通知。

sentences.english: Not completely matters, follow further notice.

definition: (to do sth) separately/as a separate action
to await a decision/to be pending
to serve as the norm/...shall prevail (as standard for rules, regulations, price etc)
to substitute/to complement in the proper order/to fill vacancies progressively
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
